::Jhiaxus/Scorponok::

Jhiaxus smirks, knowing that the puppet is done. He moves back to the computers to monitor the Atlantis base.

Jhiaxus: Hydras, you might want to check this out. Saying that the Maximal base is under attack is the understatement of the millinium. I'm reading Minions all over the base. So many that it's hard to pick up Maximal signatures through them.

Scorponok: It seems I have arrived at a busy time...

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
Hydras:
  
 "The we should take advantage quickly of current  situation, his base is under attack"said Hydras and soon he received an aencoded  message from percepor "It seems that the puppet is done, Perceptor is  coming"
  
  
  
  
  
  
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   From:    Richard    Allen 
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   Sent: Thursday, November 01, 2007 7:58    PM
   Subject: Re: G2
   

      ::Scorponok::

Scorponok: I guess I came at a good time then.    The thought of destroying Rodimus Prime... or Hot Rod... Whatever he calls    himself. That foolish Targetmaster Autobot was a pain in many of my plans so    long ago.

Airshadow <airly2002@...>    wrote:   
          
     Hydras:
      
     Hydras hissed and said dryly "gretings... now      our chances to defeat Rodimus prime increases"
      
      
            -----        Original Message ----- 
       From:        Richard        Allen 
       To:        nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com  
       Sent:        Tuesday, October 30, 2007 12:43 PM
       Subject:        Re: G2
       

              ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Scorponok::

Jhiaxus: We'll use the        puppet.

Jhiaxus spins out of the chair and stands up to greet the        G2 newcomer.

Outside the base the Scorponok body transforms to a        standing position with Zarak becoming the head. Scorponok walks into the        base to eventually find Hydras and Jhiaxus.

Scorponok: Lord        Jhiaxus, I am Scorponok; Headmaster warrior of the Generation 2 Decepticon        Empire.

Jhiaxus nods...

OOC: Hydras should recognize        Scorponok and know Zarak. And not like him I might        ad.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>        wrote: 
                         Hydras:

Hydras typed some buttons and the doors opened he          hissed "tell them 
that they can come in and I have more info bout          this bot"

A winged bot pictures, his wings were dull black hue.          His body was 
a deep black with dull red highlights. 

"Jsut we          have to wait that perceptor send us the puppet... unless 
you want to          do this personally..." said devilish Hydras

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com,          Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
>          ::Jhiaxus/Scorponok/Zarak::
> 
> After traveling          underground for some time Scorponok comes to the 
surface just          outside Hydras' base. Zarak opens the top hatch and 
climbs up          top.
> 
> Inside the base Jhiaxus takes note of          this.
> 
> Jhiaxus: Hydras, my G2 Decepticon comrade has          arrived. Shall we 
greet him?
